modName: The Hall Of Teleportation  Player Home in V2
summary: This Mod add a little house ( not a player home ) that have portals to many citys  ( Windhelm , Whitrun,Riften , Markhart, Solitude...) and also for  The Thieves Guild and The 2 sanctuary of The DarkBrotherhood ant also The High Hrothgar.
descriptionHtml:
[color=\"#000080\"][/color][font=\"Century Gothic\"][/font][size=\"7\"][/size]The Hall Of Teleportation 

This Mod add a little house ( not a player home ) that have portals to many citys  ( Windhelm , Whitrun,Riften , Markhart, Solitude...) and also for  The Thieves Guild and The 2 sanctuary of The DarkBrotherhood.

The portals for The Hall Of Teleporttion are located in (Citys) Whiterun,Windhelm ,Riften ,Markhrat Solitude , Riverhood

V.2:
-Add a secret passage to the mod where you can find a forge , a work bench , a alchemy lab , and 3 beds. ( Of course the portals are still There ;) )
-Bug Fixed
V.1:
-What The description says ;)


( If the download with manager doesn\'t work try download it manually thx :) )

Have Fun !! :)
author: Spect99

files.name: The Hall Of Teleportation Little Playerhome
